resources.string: Check you have an active internet connection.
Coin Purchase Not Supported on this device.

Note:

 1. If coins do not reflect after purchase, click restore to retry
 2. In addition to the coins earned through various ways in the app, purchased coins, reduce the need to complete various in-app activities as well as disable ads
 3. Coins are virtual items, we do not support refunds.
 4. Coins are tied to this current application install, clearing app data removes this association (Subject to change).
%1$d coins have been credited to your account. Order Id: %2$s
